{{for|the Accessory in {{XC2|-}}|Colorful Feather (XC2)}}
|-|Common = {{Infobox item |name = Colorful Feather |image = XC3 Accessory Medal.png |caption = Accrues Aggro every second. (Minor effect) |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Common |source = |sell = 1210 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Rare = {{Infobox item |name = Colorful Feather |image = XC3 Accessory Medal.png |caption = Accrues Aggro every second. (Minor effect) |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Rare |source = |sell = 1210 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Legendary = {{Infobox item |name = Colorful Feather |image = XC3 Accessory Medal.png |caption = Accrues Aggro every second. (Minor effect) |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Legendary |source = |sell = 1210 [[Gold|G]] }}
'''Colorful Feathers''' are [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessories]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} {{fr stub}} [[Category:XC3 Accessories]] [[Category:XC3FR Accessories]]

{{for|the Accessory in {{XC2|-}}|Comet Choker (XC2)}}
|-|Common = {{Infobox item |name = Comet Choker |image = XC3 Accessory Choker.png |caption = Boosts damage dealt outdoors by 30%. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Common |source = |sell = 9720 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Rare = {{Infobox item |name = Comet Choker |image = XC3 Accessory Choker.png |caption = Boosts damage dealt outdoors by 32%. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Rare |source = |sell = 9720 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Legendary = {{Infobox item |name = Comet Choker |image = XC3 Accessory Choker.png |caption = Boosts damage dealt outdoors by 35%. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Legendary |source = |sell = 9720 [[Gold|G]] }}
'''Comet Chokers''' are [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessories]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} {{fr stub}} [[Category:XC3 Accessories]] [[Category:XC3FR Accessories]]
